author: schuetzepaul
body:
The Cluster Charge Re-weighting, implemented in #22911 and #23583 and currently switched off per default, was tested internally. Hence we propose to switch the feature on by default.

Additionally, a printout was moved from _warning_ to _debug_ at a position we're dealing with unphysical SimHits.

Interested users/conveners: @tsusa @tvami @veszpv
title: SiPixelDigitizer: Switch on Cluster Charge Re-weighting
